column4: is anybody available to help me mounting a windows server drive/directory under Edgy, I can browse to it using Places, network servers, but I can't get the mount to work - i get "Connection to xxxxx failed, SMB connection failed"
is there any way i can check the ip address of a server i can connect to through Places, Network Server so that I can try and mount a server drive?
its the servers ip I'm trying to find out
